document.full_text: a centers for disease control blog post mentioning a "zombie apocalypse" as a lighthearted way to get americans to read about preparing for the hurricane season drove so much traffic that it crashed the website, the center said on thursday.
document.title: cdc "zombie apocalypse" disaster campaign crashes website
lines_and_colors: a centers for disease control blog post mentioning a "zombie apocalypse" as a lighthearted way to get americans to read about preparing for the hurricane season drove so much traffic that it crashed the website, the center said on thursday.
